arabic.title: قلبي سلمته ليك
text: خدني م الدنيا ديه من روحي

english.title: Unknown title
text: i gave up my heart to you in seconds,,my eyes can see nobody but you,,my life is in your hands
every thing in you is beautiful ,your eyes are a dream that went through my imaginition,,everything in you ,my eyes are on you ,you're taking my mind
i gave up my heart to you in seconds,,my eyes can see nobody but you,,my life is in your hands
take me from this world ,from my soul..take me make me forget about my sorrows..i'm dreamong of you
whatever i say about you ,tell me what's enough for you,no matter how much i describe for nights..whatever i say is little for you beacuse of your beauty oh precious
every dream i had about you ..oh baby ,i found it in you ..and what i've lived before you,,i'll live it tonight for you
i gave up my heart to you in seconds,,my eyes can see nobody but you,,my life is in your hands
take me from this world ,from my soul..take me make me forget about my sorrows..i'm dreamong of you
every thing in you is beautiful ,your eyes are a dream that went through my imaginition,,everything in you ,my eyes are on you ,you're taking my mind
